name: "Lucky" Ted
effect: Non-Unique. Reaction: If Ted is in the same posse as a dude about to be aced, you may ace Ted, instead.

name: A Coach Comes to Town
effect: Any one of your opponents dudes can do a job to rob the stage in the Town Square. Any of your dudes can put together a posse to protect it. If the stage goes unprotected or your opponent wins the shootout, you must pay your opponent 4 Ghost Rock (or your total Ghost Rock if you have less than 4). If you win the Shootout or the stage is not attacked, you gain 4 ghost rock.

name: A Price on His Head
effect: Noon: Choose any one Wanted dude in play. Until the end of the game, any Player that aces the dude in a Shootout gets 5 ghost rock.

name: Abandoned Mine
effect: Private. Strike. Only Terrors may move to the Abandoned Mine.

name: And Stay Down!
effect: Reaction: Play when a Harrowed dude is about to be aced. The Harrowed dude is aced and sent to Boot Hill - no pull is performed.

name: Arizona Jane
effect: Non-Unique. Noon: Boot Jane to move her to a location you own but do not control. Jane then calls out one dude at that location.

name: Arson
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and name a deed in play. If the job is successful, Pull: if the pull is clubs or spades, ace the deed, and everyone in your posse becomes Wanted.

name: Bad Tequila
effect: Noon: Boot any dude in play with influence less than two.

name: Benny Hibbs
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:0 Reaction: Boot Benny to reduce the cost of a Gadget by two as it is being brought into play.

name: Black Jack
effect: Black Jack is always Wanted.

name: Blackjacks
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Boot one of your Blackjacks dudes to gain 2 ghost rock. The dude becomes Wanted. This action can be performed any number of times per turn.

name: Blacksmith
effect: Private. +1 ghost rock production for each Mad Scientist dude in play, to a maximum total production of +3.

name: Bluff
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after Players have revealed their Draw Hands. Discard yours and draw five cards which become your new Draw Hand.

name: Bob Bidwell
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Brawl
effect: Noon: Target any location. Until after nightfall, any dude in this location may, as a Noon action, start a Shootout with any other dude at that location. The losers of the Shootout are sent home booted, instead of being aced.

name: Bucket Brigade
effect: Reaction: Play when one deed is about to be aced. The deed is not aced, but may not perform any actions for the rest of this turn and does not produce ghost rock next turn.

name: Bullet-Proof Vest
effect: Gadget Difficulty:3 The wearer of the Bullet-Proof Vest cannot be aced by the results of a Shootout unless his Draw Hand is beaten by at least two Ranks. Continue the Shootout for another round, if necessary.

name: Casino Morongo
effect: Public. Dudes aced in a Shootout in the Morongo do not go to Boot Hill - they go to their Owner's discard pile, instead.

name: Cassidy Greene
effect: Non-Unique. If you control a saloon, you may bring Cassidy into play for free at the saloon. Noon: Give a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the turn to any other dude at the same deed as Cassidy. The Dude keeps the bonus even if he or she moves.

name: Caught With yer Pants Down
effect: Shootout: Select one dude in this Shootout, who may gain no benefit from any goods for this Shootout, and receives a -1 Bullet for this Shootout (minimum zero).

name: Cave-in
effect: Noon: Choose one strike in play. That strike is booted and produces no ghost rock; it may not unboot until a dude boots there as a Noon action.

name: Charlie Landers
effect: Charlie Landers may not be called out. Charlie cannot move to a location you do not control. Noon: Boot Charlie when in a saloon to dispense free drinks, resulting in a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) until nightfall, for all other dudes in the same saloon as Charlie.

name: Cheatin' Varmint
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. His Draw Hand is reduced by 3 Ranks from its actual value (and is considered the worst possible hand of that Rank). Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Christmas Day
effect: No calling out or jobs may take place during this turn. Once during this turn, each Player may put into play for free any one goods card that they hold in their Play Hand. Ace this card.

name: Claim Jumper
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes at a strike you Control. You are now the Owner of the strike until the end of the game.

name: Claims Office
effect: Private. The Owner gains 1 ghost rock each time a player puts a strike into play. Controller Reaction: Boot and pay 2 ghost rock to prevent the purchase of any strike deed. The deed is returned to the top of that Player's deck, and the ghost rock is returned to the Player's Vault.

name: Clean Up the Town
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out any Wanted dude who is in town. If he refuses, his Influence is permanently reduced to zero. If it was already zero, he is aced if he refuses.

name: Clell Miller
effect: Non-Unique. Clell Miller gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus each time his posse aces another dude with a higher Bullet Rating in a Shootout.

name: Cletus Peacock
effect: Non-Unique. Cletus gains a +2 Bullet bonus for that Shootout when he calls someone out.

name: Collegium
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You have one additional Control Point for every Gadget in play with Gadget Difficulty higher than four.

name: Colorado Lode
effect: Private. Strike. You may ace any one strike that produces less than 3 ghost rock per turn when this card is brought into play. If you ace your own strike, then the cost of this strike is reduced by the production value of the one you aced.

name: Cordelia "Corky" Hendricks
effect: Shootout Pull: If the pull is red, Corky gets a +2 Bullet bonus for this Shootout. If it's black, she gets a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) for this Shootout. Corky can do this action once per Shootout.

name: Crack Shot
effect: Shootout: One dude's Draw bonus is changed to a Stud bonus until the end of this Shootout.

name: Dead Man's Hand
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes who calls out any booted dude in play. The called out dude must accept and enter the Shootout. If your dude has a lower Bullet Rating than the target, raise it to be equal in magnitude. If your dude survives the Shootout, he becomes Wanted.

name: Deputy John Templeton
effect: Templeton gets a +2 Bullet bonus while anyone in an opposing posse in a shootout has a lower value.

name: Dispatch Office
effect: Private. Any of the Controller's dudes at this location with Influence greater than zero has his or her Influence increased by one while at this location.

name: Diversion
effect: Reaction: Play when a dude is about to boot to join a posse. That dude does not boot, and cannot join the posse.

name: Don't Like Yer Looks
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes in the Town Square or any deed you control to call out any other dude in the same location. They begin a Shootout that can't berefused and no other dudes may join the Shootout.

name: Double Dealin'
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. That Player's entire Draw Hand is discarded and replaced by the top five cards of your deck. Your cards are discarded normally afterwards. Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Dragon's Nest Strike
effect: Private. Strike. The dude or dudes in play with the lowest value are aced when this strike is put into play from your Play Hand.

name: Drawing a Bead
effect: Shootout: Target one of your dudes in a Shootout. Gain no benefit for this dude in this round of the Shootout. Triple the Bullet Rating for this dude in all of the consecutive rounds of the Shootout.

name: Drop in the Ocean Strike
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Dust Devil
effect: Noon: Ace any one goods card in play.

name: Dynamite Launcher
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 Noon Job: If successful, boot this dude to ace the Launcher and the deed this dude is at. Pull: If the value is less than the dude's value he is returned home, otherwise he is aced.

name: Earthquake
effect: All strikes that produce less than 3 ghost rock per turn are destroyed.

name: Easter Sunday
effect: Each Player may pull for each one of their dudes that was aced last turn. If the pull is red, he or she is returned to play as a normal, non-Harrowed dude. Ace this card.

name: Eddie Bellows
effect: Eddie can never have a Bullet Rating higher than two. Shootout: Boot Eddie to look at the Play Hand of an opponent who has dudes at this Shootout.

name: Erik Zarkov
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Shootout Pull: If the pull is a Club, Zarkov is aced. Otherwise, one weapon Gadget Zarkov carries gets a 3 Bullet bonus for this Shootout.

name: Eurika!
effect: Eureka enters play attached to your gang. Whenever Eureka attaches to a Player's gang, he draws 2 cards and adds them to his Play Hand. A Player's maximum hand size is increased by 2 while Eureka is attached. Eureka leaves that Player when a dude in his gang is aced and attaches to the next Player on the left. Only one Eureka can be in play at a time.

name: Exchange Office
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Exchange Office to gain 1 ghost rock for every deed in play that produces more than 3 ghost rock.

name: Extortion
effect: Noon: Target a deed that you currently control but do not own. You maintain control of this deed until another Player, as a Noon action, pays you ghost rock equal to the amount of Influence that you had at that location when you played this card. At that point, control of the deed is determined normally.

name: Fanning the Hammer
effect: Reaction: Play when your posse has won a round of a Shootout to increase by two the number of dudes aced in the opposing posse.

name: Father Juan Navarro
effect: Father Juan may not boot to perform the Blackjack Outfit's ability. Shootout: Boot Father Juan to withdraw him from any Shootout. He returns home.

name: Fineas von Landingham
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Noon: Boot von Landingham to gain 2 ghost rock, brought in by airship from a secret mine in the Badlands.

name: Foale's Folly
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Founder's Day
effect: Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Framed
effect: The ghost rock cost of this card is double the target's Influence. Noon: Target one dude in play who becomes Wanted. That dude's Controller may, as a Noon action, boot a Law Dog he controls to Pull: if the pull is a red card, the dude is no longer Wanted and that Player can choose one of your dudes who becomes Wanted instead.

name: Friends in Low Places
effect: Noon: Look at one of your opponents' Play Hands.

name: Fu Leng's Laundry & tailoring
effect: Private. Fu Leng's cost is reduced by 2 if you have Tao Cheng in play.

name: Full Moon
effect: Choose a dude and Pull: If the card's value is greater than the dude's value, then you gain control of the dude until after nightfall, but his upkeep cost is tripled for this turn. If you do not pay the upkeep, the dude is immediately returned to his original Controller. Ace this card.

name: Gatling Pistol
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:3

name: Getting' outta Hand
effect: Reaction: Play just after a dude performs an action and is at a deed you control. One of your dudes at that location may call out the acting dude who must accept the challenge. No other dudes may join this Shootout.

name: Giddyup!
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one of your dudes boots to join a posse. Your dude does not have to boot to join this posse.

name: Git!
effect: Noon Pull: If the pull value is greater than the value of the target dude at one of your deeds, start a Shootout that may not be refused between that dude and one of your dudes at the same location. Any dudes adjacent to the deed may join either side of the Shootout. Dudes not actually in the target's location must boot to join the posse.

name: Golden Mare Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel. The Owner gains one ghost rock each time a dude is put into play from someone's Play Hand.

name: Grave Robbin'
effect: Noon: Get 1 ghost rock for each dude buried in Boot Hill.

name: Graveyard
effect: Private. The Owner gains 3 ghost rock each time a dude is aced. Controller Reaction: Boot the Graveyard to negate the Harrowing of any dude.

name: Gremlins
effect: Noon: Target one Gadget in play. The Gadget is aced. Noon: Boot a Mad Scientist in play.

name: Hangin' Judge Gabriel
effect: No warrants or bounties may be issued for Gabriel. Gabriel cannot be Wanted. Noon: Boot to ace any Wanted dude if Gabriel is in the same location or adjacent. Ace Gabriel after he "claims" a Wanted dude.

name: Haunting
effect: Noon: Play on any deed, which has its ghost rock production cut in half (round down). The deed gains the Badlands trait while haunted. The Haunting will end when a Blessed or Shaman dude at this deed is booted as a Noon action.

name: Head 'em Off at the Pass
effect: Reaction: Play when a Posse is being assembled for a job. Any one of your dudes can join the posse, regardless of their location and whether or not they are booted. You may not join a posse if the Player assembling it does not want you to.

name: Headsman's Axe
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after any dude is aced. The dude may not be brought into play again through any means.

name: Heavy Rain
effect: Until after nightfall, dudes and posses may not move or ride farther than adjacent locations by any means.

name: Hector Casparo
effect: Non-Unique. Reaction: After Draw hands are revealed, you can discard a card from your Draw hand and redraw one card when Casparo is gambling (as a result of a card effect) or in a Shootout.

name: Hell's Fury
effect: Noon Pull: Choose a dude in Boot Hill that you also hold in your Play Hand. If the value of the pull is higher than the dude's value, remove the dude in Boot Hill from play and bring your dude into play, without costs. This dude is now Harrowed.

name: Henry's Hole
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Hideout
effect: Private. Out of Town. When this deed is brought into play, choose any one deed out of town that this deed is "adjacent to." Your posse gets a +1 Draw bonus when defending at the Hideout, and always gets the first Shootout action.

name: Humphrey Walters
effect: Town Founder. Lycanthrope. Shootout Pull: You can use this ability once per shootout. If the pull is red, put the Werewolf into play unbooted and under your control from your hand in place of Humphrey and put Humphrey into your play hand. Humphrey and the Werewolf are different Dudes for uniqueness purposes. All attached cards are discarded. If a Full Moon has occurred this turn, this pull is automatically red.

name: Ignore 'im
effect: Shootout: Remove one of your dudes from this Shootout. Your dude is sent home, booted.

name: J.P. Coleman
effect: The Town Sheriff. Coleman costs five less ghost rock to enter play from your Play Hand or for upkeep if the Fear Level is higher then 5.

name: Jail
effect: Private. Government. Any Player who aces a Wanted dude may elect instead to put them in the Jail, collecting a bounty equal to half the jailed dude's ghost rock cost. A dude in Jail is out of play (except for uniqueness) until they are broken out with a Noon Job.

name: Jessie Freemont
effect: Non-Unique. Jessie will not call out a Law Dog.

name: Joker
effect: This card is only useful for draws and pulls. Ace this card after it is used in a draw or pull. This card is a Wildcard: it can be any suit and value. You may not have more than two Jokers in a deck. This card does not count against your deck limit.

name: Just a Graze
effect: Reaction: Play after Hands have been shown in a Shootout. The number of your dudes killed in that round is reduced by one and the Shootout continues normally.

name: Kenny
effect: Sidekick. While this dude is in a Shootout, Kenny acts as an additional dude in the posse with a zero-draw Bullet Rating.

name: Lad Saloon
effect: Public. Any dude called out while occupying the LAD Saloon has +1 Bullet for the shootout.

name: Lady Luck
effect: Noon: You may discard as many of your cards as you like during nightfall this turn.

name: Law Dogs
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 You get one Victory Point every time you put a Wanted dude into Jail. You get one Victory Point every time you ace a Wanted dude who has more than one Influence.

name: Lilith Vandekamp
effect: Noon: Boot Lilith to gain 2 ghost rock if she is in a saloon or brothel.

name: Lynch Mob
effect: Noon: Choose any one Wanted dude. Any Player may boot as many un-Wanted dudes they wish to join the mob. If the number of dudes in the lynch mob is greater than the combined Bullet Rating of the Wanted dude's gang at his location, then he is aced.

name: Marcus Perriwinkle
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:0 Gadgets being attached to Marcus have their ghost rock cost reduced by two.

name: Mechanical Horse
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Horse. Noon: Boot the Horse to move this dude to any other location. Reaction: Boot the Horse instead of this dude when joining a posse.

name: Meredith Singleton
effect: Noon: Boot Meredith to boot any non-Terror dude at the same location. (Anyone will listen to Meredith speak.)

name: Mick Caples
effect: Non-Unique. Reaction: When you put a strike into play, boot Mick and Pull: If it is a face card, the strike's production increases by one. If it is a Joker, the strike's production increases by 2.

name: Miner's Union House
effect: Private. The Union House's Controller never has his strikes' production decreased or prevented when he is both Owner and Controller of the strike. The production of the Union House is equal to the number of strikes in play.

name: Nash Bilton
effect: Noon: Nash calls out one dude at this location. He may perform this action while booted.

name: Nasty Doc's
effect: Private. Reaction: Boot Doc's and ace any non-Terror dude you control to Harrow a dude who has just been killed. If you didn't control the dude before, you do now.

name: Nice Boots, Chief
effect: Reaction: Play when an opposing dude is aced in a Shootout. Take any one goods from that dude and attach it to one of your dudes that was in the Shootout.

name: Old Moon Saloon
effect: Public. Any time another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand, the Owner of the Old Moon Saloon gains one ghost rock.

name: Oswald Hardinger
effect: Mad Scientist:4 Reaction: Boot Oswald as a Gadget is producing an action to cancel the action. Shootout: Boot Oswald to reduce a weapon Gadget's bonus to zero. Only affects weapons in a Shootout Oswald is in.

name: Out of Ammo
effect: Shootout: Target dude in this Shootout becomes a Draw instead of a Stud.

name: Pannin' for Gold
effect: Reaction: Play when a strike is aced to receive ghost rock equal to the amount the strike would normally provide during upkeep.

name: Pearl-Handled Revolver
effect: Weapon. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout.

name: Perry's Pawnshop
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Pawnshop and ace a goods card you control to gain ghost rock equal to half of that card's ghost rock cost (round down).

name: Pharmacy
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Pharmacy and pay two ghost rock to unboot a dude in an adjacent location.

name: Photographer Shop
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: Boot the Photographer Shop when a dude is brought into play to gain ghost rock equal to the dude's Influence.

name: Pike's Puddle Mine
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Pinto
effect: Horse. Shootout: Boot the Pinto to remove this dude from this Shootout. Move this dude to any out of town deed you control (or home if you have no out of town deeds). This dude is booted. Pull: If the value is greater than your dude's value, the Pinto is aced at the end of the ride.

name: Pony Express
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot to discard a card and draw a new one.

name: Prof. Parnham's Miracle Elixir
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Reaction: Ace the Elixir instead of this dude. Return the dude home, booted.

name: Prof. Susan Franklin
effect: Mad Scientist:0

name: Quickdraw
effect: Reaction: Play in the event of a tie (the same Hand Rank) in a Shootout to win the Shootout by one Rank.

name: Raid
effect: Noon Job: One of your dudes gathers a posse to raid your opponent's Vault, at his or her home. If the Raid is successful, Pull the top card from your opponent's deck and take an amount of ghost rock equal to half the value (round up) from the target Player. All dudes in your posse become Wanted.

name: Ray Gun
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:6 This Gadget has no cost if being attached to Erik Zarkov.

name: Roan
effect: Horse. Reaction: Boot the Roan instead of booting this dude when riding to a new location. You cannot move a booted dude in this fashion.

name: Robert Holmes
effect: Non-Unique Noon: Boot Holmes to retrieve any Gadget you control from any Boot Hill and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Rock Ridge Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Rocket Pack
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Horse. Shootout: This dude moves to this location and joins one of the posses in this Shootout. Shootout: Boot the Pack to exit this Shootout and go home. Noon: Boot the Pack to move this dude to a different location.

name: Run Outta Town
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Target any one dude controlled by that Player. Pull: If the value is equal to or higher than the dude's value, the dude is discarded along with any goods he controls. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Sam's General Store
effect: Public. Controller Reaction: Boot to reduce by 2 the cost of any goods card you are putting into play.

name: San Simeon Mine
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Sandra Harris
effect: Noon: Look at a random card in an another Player's Play Hand.

name: Scalpin'
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your dudes just Aced another dude. Your dude gains Influence permanently equal to one half (round down) of the aced dude's Influence.

name: Schoolhouse
effect: Public. Government. Schoolhouse may not enter play if the Fear Level is above 3.

name: Scrapyard
effect: Private. All of your Gadgets cost 1 less ghost rock to bring into play while you control Scrapyard.

name: Shortcut
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your dudes is moving to a new location (not as part of a posse). This move does not boot your dude.

name: Snake Eyes
effect: Reaction: Play after any pull has been revealed to have the pull discarded. The Player performing the pull redraws.

name: Spirit of Kentucky Shaft
effect: Private. Strike.

name: St. Martin's Chapel
effect: Public. Holy Ground. No Terrors may move to St. Martin's or call out a dude within it.

name: Still
effect: Noon: Boot the Still and this dude to boot any other dude in play with a lower value than your dude. Noon Pull: Boot the Still. This dude permanently changes his value into the value of the pull. If the pull was an ace, the Still and this dude are aced.

name: Sun in Yer Eyes
effect: Shootout: Play at the beginning of a Shootout to give one opponent a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) for this Shootout.

name: Sweaty Dynamite
effect: Noon Pull: If it is a Club, this dude is aced. Otherwise, boot this dude and leave the Dynamite on this deed. Any dude may ace this card, as a Noon Job. If the Dynamite is still on the deed after nightfall, the deed is aced.

name: Tao Cheng "T.C."
effect: Shootout: T.C. gets a +2 Bullet bonus in a Shootout if none of the opponents is carrying a weapon.

name: The 1st Bank of Gomorra
effect: Public. The Controller's ghost rock may not be stolen. If control of the First Bank changes, the new Controller takes half of the old Controller's ghost rock (round down). All dudes have their Influence reduced by one (minimum zero) while at the First Bank.

name: The Alright Corral
effect: Private. Any horse the Controller is putting into play has its cost reduced by 3.

name: The Courthouse
effect: Public. Government. Only a Law Dog may move to the Courthouse. Controller Noon: Boot to make a dude un-Wanted. Controller Noon: Boot to ace any dude in jail.

name: The Desert Rose Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: The Golden Crack
effect: Private. Strike.

name: The Sabbath
effect: If the Fear Level is less than four, all Terrors are booted and cannot unboot or perform actions this turn.

name: The Slaughterhouse
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Slaughterhouse to remove any aced dude from play. That dude may not be brought into play by any player for the rest of this game.

name: The Tree
effect: Public. Any dudes at this location are considered adjacent to all deeds in town, but cannot be called out without a card effect.

name: The Undertaker's
effect: Private. The Controller gains 1 ghost rock every time a dude is aced.

name: Tombstone Dispatch Branch Office
effect: Private. The Dispatch Branch counts as 1 Influence for the Controller's total. Controller Reaction: Boot the Branch Office when a dude becomes Wanted. Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Town Hall
effect: Public. Government. Controller Reaction: Boot Town Hall and one or more of your dudes to prevent a deed from entering play. Your dudes must have more total Influence than the ghost rock cost of the deed to perform this action. The deed is aced, but no ghost rock is spent.

name: Vampiric Dance Hall Girl
effect: Abomination For each dude that is aced at the same location, she gains +1 Bullet until after nightfall.

name: Victor Navarro
effect: Reaction: Boot Victor to join any Shootout immediately after Draw Hands are shown if anyone in your gang is in the Shootout.

name: Warrant
effect: Noon: Target any dude in play. Boot one or more of your dudes who have a combined Influence greater than the target. The target dude is now Wanted.

name: Winchester Rifle
effect: Weapon.

name: Wishing Well
effect: Public. Controller Noon: Boot the Wishing Well and spend 1 ghost rock. Pull: 2-5, get nothing; 6-8, get 1 ghost rock; 9-J, get 2 ghost rock; Q-K, get 3 ghost rock; A, get 4 ghost rock; Joker, lose 2 ghost rock (if possible).

name: Yellow Belly
effect: Reaction: Play when a dude refuses when being called out. The dude is -1 Influence and -1 Bullet (minimum zero), permanently.

name: Yer all Chicken!
effect: Noon: Target one of your dudes in the Town Square. Each opposing Player may send one of their dudes for a Shootout with your dude, or else must give you one ghost rock. Begin with the Player on your left and go clockwise once around the table. If your dude is aced by a challenger, the remaining players do not have to pay you. No other dudes may join these Shootouts.
